Meta.title: Remove Faith Limit for Faction Equipment
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
这个mod会移除任何装备的 派系词条 的生效条件 (目前实际只有玩家自己信仰的条件)
这将使玩家在信仰任意神时都能正常的对全队启用神器效果
不同于 'God Artifact Limit Remove' 此mod是通过让生效条件永久为真达成目的, 同时不会改变词条类型 但也不会检测物品id来针对每个神器处理, 如有特殊需求请订阅 'God Artifact Limit Remove' id=3364742845
！！！注意: 安装/卸载 此mod时请先确保玩家及友军身上任何有派系效果的装备已被脱下, 避免潜在的属性错误隐患！！！
This mod removes the activation conditions for faction-related effects of any equipment (currently only the player's own faith condition)
This change allows players to enable artifact effects for their entire team regardless of the deity they worship
Unlike 'God Artifact Limit Remove', this mod achieves its purpose by permanently setting the condition to true without altering the effect type However, it does not check the item ID to handle each artifact individually If you have special needs, please subscribe to 'God Artifact Limit Remove' id=3364742845
！！！Warning: When installing/uninstalling this mod, please ensure that any equipment with faction effects on the player and allies has been unequipped to avoid potential attribute errors！！！
